EnhancedContent:
I upgraded to Windows 11 three days ago, and now I want to revert back to Windows 10, but the system won't let me. I would like to ask if there is a time limit for this?

Thank you for your answer.
Title: Upgraded to Windows 11 and cannot revert back to Windows 10.
Description:
I upgraded to Windows 11 three days ago, and now I want to revert back to Windows 10, but the system won't let me. I would like to ask if there is a time limit for this?

Thank you for your answer.
Author: JettStone
